titles.title: Hopewell Township Investment Act of 1994
Hopewell Township Investment Act of 1994

To provide for the conveyance of certain lands and improvements in Hopewell Township, Pennsylvania, to a nonprofit organization known as the "Beaver County Corporation for Economic Development" to provide a site for economic development.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 103-768.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 416.

action.text: Mr. Traficant moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Petri objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/4/1994--Passed House amended. Hopewell Township Investment Act of 1994 - Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to convey, by negotiated sale at fair market value, certain land in Hopewell Township, Pennsylvania, to the Beaver County Corporation for Economic Development. States that if such conveyance is not made within 180 days after the enactment of this Act, then the Administrator may dispose of the land under surplus property provisions of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949.
